conversion_verification.notes: The second image remains a 2D orthographic floor plan. It is a slight stylistic variation of the first image with a grey background, but it lacks any 3D perspective, wall height, or volumetric representation.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: No 3D transformation has occurred. Textures are flat and the view is pure top-down orthographic.

detected_errors.description: The second image is still a 2D floor plan with no visible wall height or 3D geometry.

summary: The conversion failed to generate any 3D geometry, resulting in a second 2D floor plan image instead of a 3D model.
